Description:
NPE with invalid url
Build number:2.2.1.v20070813

steps to reproduce:
1. Preview report in Web Viewer.
2. change url like "..framset?__overwrite=truereport=...", I missed "&" between overwrite and report context parameter.

Expected result:
Error dialog to indicate error.

Actual result:
Blank for frameset servlet without any error indication.
Preview servlet will display NPE.
